name: Sudoko
discri: A logic-based number puzzle where players fill a 9x9 grid with numbers 1-9, ensuring that each number appears only once in each row, column, and 3x3 subgrid. It's perfect for exercising the brain, improving concentration, and providing a challenging yet rewarding experience. Ideal for relaxing, traveling, or simply enjoying some quiet time.
maxTime: This exciting kids party will give your child a birthday of memories and fun picnic games for just
